question:
The Ministry of Culture had recently organised the Rashtriya Sanskriti Mahotsav (RSM) from 14th to 20th January, 2018 under the Ek Bharat Shreshtha Bharat matrix. In this context, consider the following statements:
  1. Ek Bharat Shreshtha Bharat programme was launched to mark the birth anniversary of Sardar Vallabhbhai Patel
  2. Karnataka and Uttarakhand are the two states that paired to promote the unity in diversity during the RSM, 2018
Which of the above statements is/are correct?
explanation: First statement is correct. Ek Bharat Shreshtha Bharat programme was launched to mark the birth anniversary of Sardar Vallabhbhai Patel. Second statement is correct. Karnataka and Uttarakhand are the two states that paired to promote the unity in diversity during the RSM, 2018. The 7th edition of “Rashtriya Sanskriti Mahotsav-2018” was inaugurated at Bangaluru, Karnataka on 14th January 2018. The cultural festival aimed at promoting unity in diversity in our country.
